gaia::base::String mFilename

Detailed Description

Supply a data contained in a file to an HttpRequest.

Load contain of a file and send its contain during that request. 

 HttpFileEntity hfe;
 hfe.setFilename(gaia::base::String("/data/data/example.txt");
